text: Karin Anna-Lena Granhagen (born 7 January 1938) is a Swedish actress and singer. She has appeared in 40 movies and television shows since 1958. She starred in the 1969 movie Made in Sweden, which won a Silver Bear award at the 19th Berlin International Film Festival. Granhagen also starred in Musik ombord (1958), Damen i svart (1958), Mannequin in Red (1958), Himmel och pannkaka (1959), Sommar och syndare (1960), På en bänk i en park (1960), The Cat and the Canary (1961), The Cats (1965), Stimulantia (1967), Hugs and Kisses (1967), Children's Island (1980), Love Me! (1986) and Glasblåsarns barn (1998). Granhagen was born in Luleå, Sweden. She was engaged to actor Olof Thunberg. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Swedish singers Category:People from Luleå
title: Lena Granhagen
